b'Mahjong Hishouden: Naki no Ryuu': b'The protagonist, Ryuu or Crying Dragon, is a mysterious man who often plays games with the gang members. He only wins by "ron," a move in which one needs to wait for the opponent\'s tile to complete the win.\n\n*"Ron" is also called "naki" in mahjong, which has the same pronunciation as "crying" in Japanese.'
[b'Mahjong Hishoden: Naki no Ryuu', b'Naki no Ryuu: Hiryuu no Shou (1991)']
